title: 57.2 (LOA)
content:
You hear the murmuring of a dozen different conversations as you walk through the tavern. It’s common knowledge that news spreads faster in A Hearty Brew than anywhere else in the Valley. You imagine that if you needed to find someone—or something—asking around here would be a good way to start.

If you have completed the FIND THE NEST mission but you haven’t REUNITED TWO FRIENDS, go to 1.105.
